description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DeadlySpace is a game set in the far reaches of a distant galaxy. Choose your faction, build your towers, defend your Starbase. How long can you last? 1-4 Player Coop Split-Screen Action. Master 6 Different Factions. Conquer 60+ maps. Discover 25+ Towers. Musical soundtrack written just for DeadlySpace.
description.short: DeadlySpace is a game set in the far reaches of a distant galaxy. Choose your faction, build your towers, defend your Starbase.
